Name: 背水一战
Desc: 无法获取护盾值，来自成员自身的所有治疗效果降低90%（不影响驻守治疗效果）

Name: 寸步难行
Desc: 每隔30秒，指定一个方格落下陨石：\n陨石会对我方造成伤害并生成红色减速区域，区域内我方移速-50%；\n同时最多存在3个减速区域，减速区域也会继承至后续战斗

Name: 极度虚弱
Desc: 每隔30秒，指定一个方格落下陨石：\n陨石会对我方造成伤害并生成绿色虚弱区域，区域内我方攻击力-30%；\n同时最多存在3个虚弱区域，虚弱区域也会继承至后续战斗

Name: 背水
Desc: 来自成员自身的所有治疗效果降低90%（不影响驻守治疗效果）

Name: 泥沼
Desc: 每场战斗开始时，随机生成一个红色减速区域，区域内我方移速-50%；\n同时最多存在3个减速区域，减速区域也会继承至后续战斗

Name: 虚弱
Desc: 每场战斗开始时，随机生成一个绿色虚弱区域，区域内我方攻击力-30%；\n同时最多存在3个虚弱区域，虚弱区域也会继承至后续战斗

Name: buff名字
Desc: 高难继承玩法-环境词缀-不是空怪则清除免疫效果-默认免疫上述所有buff，检测到不是空怪才移除免疫（记得补充技能标记buff）

Name: 衰弱
Desc: After being hit by an enemy, allied Movement Speed reduces by 30% for 5s.

Name: 强攻
Desc: Enemies' ATK increases by 30%.

Name: 过热
Desc: If an ally can cast their Signature with intervals shorter than 10s, they will be unable to cast it again for 10s after the 4th cast.

Name: 驻守强化-进攻&先锋型
Desc: 驻守后，出战角色中<color=#1f93e5>不包含</color>进攻&先锋型成员时，驻守获得以下效果：\n额外伤害加成+50%；\n成功闪避敌人攻击时，造成一次4000%倍率的对应属性伤害，有1秒冷却时间；

Name: 驻守强化-装甲型
Desc: Stationing will grant the following effects if there are <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Tanks deployed:\nWhen dealing damage, reduces the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 25% and Elemental Resistance by 60%. Additionally reduces Defense by 100% if it's Physical DMG dealt;\nGrants 1 Signal Orb per second.

Name: 驻守强化-辅助&增幅型
Desc: 驻守后，出战角色中<color=#1f93e5>不包含</color>辅助&增幅型成员时，驻守获得以下效果：\n攻击力+50%、对应属性伤害加成+50%，物理属性额外提供+100%暴击率；\n成功闪避敌人攻击时，回复5%最大生命值；

Name: 驻守强化-进攻&先锋型
Desc: 驻守后，出战角色中<color=#1f93e5>不包含</color>进攻&先锋型成员时，驻守获得以下效果：\n额外伤害加成+50%；\n成功闪避敌人攻击时，造成一次4000%倍率的对应属性伤害，有1秒冷却时间；

Name: 驻守强化-装甲型
Desc: Stationing will grant the following effects if there are <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Tanks deployed:\nWhen dealing damage, reduces the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 25% and Elemental Resistance by 60%. Additionally reduces Defense by 100% if it's Physical DMG dealt;\nGrants 1 Signal Orb per second.

Name: 驻守强化-辅助&增幅型
Desc: Stationing will grant the following effects if there are <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Support or Amplifiers deployed:\nATK +50%, corresponding Elemental DMG Bonus +50%, additionally CRIT Rate +100% for Physical;\nRestores 5% of max HP upon a successful Dodge.

Name: 强健体魄
Desc: 我方成员根据当前血量获得加成，无法重复获取：\n大于80%：获得100%额外伤害加成、霸体与30%额外伤害减免；\n大于50%：获得50%额外伤害加成；大于20%：获得20%额外伤害加成

Name: 驻守强化-湮灭型
Desc: Stationing will grant the following effects if there are <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Annihilators, Attackers, or Vanguards deployed:\nExtra DMG Bonus +50%\nUpon successfully dodging an enemy's attack, deals the corresponding elemental damage equal to 4000% of that damage once. Cooldown: 1s.

Name: Station Enhancement - Observer
Desc: <size=24>Stationing will grant the following effects if there <color=#1f93e5>are</color> Tanks and <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Support or Amplifiers deployed: ATK +50%, corresponding Elemental DMG Bonus +50%; CRIT Rate +100% for Physical DMG; Restores 5% of max HP upon a successful Dodge. Stationing will grant the following effects if there <color=#1f93e5>are</color> Support and Amplifiers and <color=#1f93e5>no</color> Tanks deployed: When dealing damage, reduces the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 25% and Elemental Resistance by 60%. Additionally reduces Defense by 100% if it's Physical DMG dealt; Grants 1 Signal Orb per second.</size>

Name: 锋锐
Desc: 敌人受到物理伤害显著提升

Name: 易燃
Desc: 敌人受到火属性伤害显著提升

Name: 雷潮
Desc: 敌人受到雷属性伤害显著提升

Name: 霜结
Desc: 敌人受到冰属性伤害显著提升

Name: 暗蚀
Desc: 敌人受到暗属性伤害显著提升

Name: 强袭
Desc: 敌人受到空属性伤害显著提升

Name: 审戒残诗
Desc: 后续战斗中，其他敌人在特定时机会召唤维罗妮卡协助作战

Name: 笼幕棘雨
Desc: 后续战斗中，其他敌人在特定时机会召唤回音协助作战

Name: 熔泉沸炀
Desc: 后续战斗中，其他敌人在特定时机会召唤斯凯奇协助作战

Name: Glazepeak
Desc: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing Physical DMG equal to 5% of the enemy's ATK. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Impure
Desc: Hitting the target applies a stack of Null Heal, reducing healing received by 20% per stack for 8s, up to 5 stacks.

Name: Overweight
Desc: Dodge cost increases by 50%. When Dodge Gauge is depleted, Movement Speed reduces by 30% for 5s.

Name: Shaded Gloom
Desc: When attacked, has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing Physical DMG equal to 8% of the enemy's ATK. 2s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Name: Laceration
Desc: Hitting the target applies a stack of Null Heal, reducing healing received by 20% per stack for 5s, up to 3 stacks.

Name: Stillness
Desc: Dodge cost increases by 50%.

Name: Fetter of Wolves
Desc: In subsequent battles, other enemies may summon Fenrir to assist them at specific moments.

Name: Path Deflector
Desc: In subsequent battles, other enemies may summon Madam Monzano to assist them at specific moments.

Name: Sovereign Trample
Desc: In subsequent battles, other enemies may summon "The Emperor" to assist them at specific moments.
